front.title: IEEE Draft Standard Criteria for Digital Computers in Safety Systems of Nuclear Power Generating Stations

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Additional computer specific requirements to supplement the criteria and requirements of IEEE Std 603-2009 are specified. Within the context of this standard, the term computer is a system that includes computer hardware, software, firmware, and interfaces. The criteria contained herein, in conjunction with criteria in IEEE Std 603-2009, establish minimum functional and design requirements for computers used as components of a safety system
